data.title: Nigel Cole
data.meta_description: Nigel Cole. Director: Kalender Girls. Nigel Cole was born in 1959 in Launceston, Cornwall, England, UK. He is a director and actor, known for Kalender Girls (2003), Grasgeflüster (2000) and So was wie Liebe (2005). He has been married to Kate Isitt since 1 January 2000. They have two children. He was previously married to Sally Brampton.
data.text: Nigel Cole was born in 1959 in Launceston, Cornwall, England, UK. He is a director and actor, known for Kalender Girls (2003), Grasgeflüster (2000) and So was wie Liebe (2005). He has been married to Kate Isitt since January 1, 2000. They have two children. He was previously married to Sally Brampton.
